channel.title: [317] Cant Attack One of my Npcs [317]
channel.description:
Source: Delta
I need to add this npc to my rsps, I can spawn him and he looks good but if I click Attack it doesn't work. How Can I fix this as I really need this npc a lot.
Thanks

item.title: [317] Cant Attack One of my Npcs [317]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

In my Npc.cfg This is the code for him: npc = 2060 Slash_Bash 111 703 100

I dont think its the health

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Cant Attack One of my Npcs [317]

item.title: [317] Cant Attack One of my Npcs [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ambition_Rsps Ambition Rsps
item.description:
@Ambition_Rsps wrote:

go to Npc.cfg, and if you see the npc number and nothing by it, add numbers, the reason you cant attack him is because he does not have a number set for his hp

Read full topic
